[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/iStock-961901900-scaled.jpg” background_blend=”color” custom_padding=”120px||79px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” filter_brightness=”127%” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” module_alignment=”center” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]

ORLANDO – MIAMI

6 DAYS/5 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ min_height=”162px” custom_margin=”-31px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”27px|0px|29px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||6px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||200px||” custom_padding=”17px|0px|26px|0px|false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ width=”100%” max_width=”1544px” module_alignment=”center” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”139px” custom_margin=”-3px||-3px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT ORLANDO

Welcome to Orlando. Orlando is the sixth largest city of Florida and is also known to be its largest inland city. The presence of Disney World theme park has made this city a well-known vacation spot. This city is said to welcome more than 52 million tourists every year.  Upon arrival you will be transferred to the hotel.

Overnight in Orlando.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 02: SEA WORLD

After breakfast, today you will visit the world’s largest Marine Park Sea World – Here you shall discover many attractions. We dare you to take a one-of-a kind water coaster thrill ride through the mysterious lost city of Atlantis. Soar through danger on a jet copter ride to the Wild Arctic. At Sea World, touch, feed or get face to face with awesome and amazing wild animals and get in on all the action that draws you back again and again!

Overnight in Orlando.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”139px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”||4px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: ORLANDO – MAGIC KINGDOM

After breakfast, today you will visit Magic Kingdom, which covers 107 acres, opened on October 1, 1971. It’s been dubbed “The Most Magical Place on Earth!” and is home to seven themed lands, and dozens of attractions that appeal to all ages. It is the place where storybook fantasy is everyday reality, and Disney classics are brought to life from the moment you step onto Main Street USA, you are transported to a place where the cares of the outside world seem to magically melt away.

 Overnight in Orlando.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”211px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: MIAMI

Breakfast at the hotel.

Proceed to the hotel check out, wait in the lobby for transfer to  MCO Airport for your flight to Miami, Florida. 

Arrive in Miami, transfer to the hotel.

Overnight in Miami.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”198px” custom_margin=”-4px|||||” custom_padding=”10px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 05: MIAMI CITY TOUR

Breakfast at the hotel. Wait in the lobby for pickup for your half day Miami city tour.

We invite you to discover the beautiful side of Miami. Gorgeous mansions, the “heart” of South Beach; were you can appreciate the Art Deco District, Coconut Grove, the beautiful streets of Coral Gables, with a stop at the famous Biltmore Hotel; The Little Havana an its Calle Ocho (Eight St), Downtown and the Financial District. The last stop is the Bayside Market Place; a unique mall with plenty of exclusive shops, restaurants, bars, and a huge variety of outdoors entertainment in a relaxing atmosphere.  This beautiful place is guaranteeing to be an unforgettable time for you and your family.

After the city tour, return to  the hotel.

Overnight in Miami.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Arial,Oswald,Georgia”]

DAY 06: DEPARTURE FROM MIAMI

Breakfast at the hotel.

Check out of the hotel and transfer to MIA Airport for flight to next destination/home.

HAVE A SAFE TRIP!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.22″ min_height=”873px” custom_margin=”-3px||-147px|||” custom_padding=”0||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ min_height=”0px” custom_margin=”-2px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”1px|0px||0px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″]
